mapper.insert: SELECT TOA_ARCHIVE_PERMISSION_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL INSERT INTO toa_archive_permission(ID,FOLDER_ID,CATEGORY,USER_ID,DEPT_ID,PERMISSION_VALUE,DELETE_FLAG,CREATE_USER,CREATE_USER_DEPT,CREATE_USER_ORG,CREATE_DATE,MODIFY_USER,MODIFY_DATE,WEIGHT,EXT_DATE1,EXT_DATE2,EXT_NUM1,EXT_NUM2,EXT_NUM3,EXT_STR1,EXT_STR2,EXT_STR3,EXT_STR4,EXT_STR5) VALUES (#{id},#{folderId,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{userId,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{deptId,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{permissionValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{deleteFlag,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{createUser,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{createUserDept,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{createUserOrg,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{modifyUser,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{weight,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{extDate1,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{extDate2,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{extNum1,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{extNum2,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{extNum3,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{extStr1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{extStr2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{extStr3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{extStr4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{extStr5,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update:
UPDATE toa_archive_permission set
FOLDER_ID = #{folderId},
CATEGORY = #{category},
USER_ID = #{userId},
DEPT_ID = #{deptId},
DELETE_FLAG = #{deleteFlag},
CREATE_USER = #{createUser},
CREATE_USER_DEPT = #{createUserDept},
CREATE_USER_ORG = #{createUserOrg},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate},
MODIFY_USER = #{modifyUser},
WEIGHT = #{weight},
PERMISSION_VALUE = #{permissionValue}
where ID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT count(ID) FROM toa_archive_permission t where t.folder_id=#{folderId}

SELECT p.PERMISSION_VALUE permissionValue
FROM toa_archive_permission p, toa_archive_sub_permission s WHERE ((s.control_id = #{userId} and s.data_type=1) or (s.control_id = #{deptId} and s.data_type=2) or (s.control_id = #{orgId} and s.data_type=2)) and p.folder_id = #{folderId} and p.id=s.permission_id and p.delete_flag=0
